body_html:
The key/solution is the version number in the URL. I was trying to install with pip3 using python 3.4, so I had to change the URL to: https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/linux/cpu/tensorflow-0.6.0-cp34-none-linux_x86_64.whl

This took waaay too long to figure out :-\
